I recently bought two PSA 2 Cobbs and am planning to keep the lesser of the 2….so this guy is available. I bought this via Heritage and paid $9450 after taxes and shipping, so looking for the same. Will consider trades also

I’m available via PM for any questions you may have and can provide references if needed.

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
